data.title: 2024 Awards Ceremony honors students, faculty and staff
data.meta_description: The IU School of Medicine Class of 2024 recognized faculty, staff, and fellow students at the 2024 Awards Ceremony, held May 9 at the Indiana Historical Society.
data.text:
The IU School of Medicine Class of 2024 recognized faculty, staff, and fellow students at the 2024 Awards Ceremony, held May 9 at the Indiana Historical Society.

In addition to the awards, class members continuing their medical careers in the U.S. military were decorated with commissions.

Those honored include the following:
